EmailTemplate.description: Sends Email when a FixMyStreet Record Errors on sending to Confirm
EmailTemplate.name: FixMyStreet Error
EmailTemplate.subject: FixMyStreet - Error on Sending to Confirm
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Error creating Confirm entry from FixMyStreet - Ref {!FixMyStreet__c.Name}
https://rutland.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/FixMyStreet__c/{!FixMyStreet__c.Id}/view
